description.narrative: 1. Overall Objective To improve public health and to foster socio-economic development of the community. 2. Specific Objectives i) To provide Nairobi with adequate drinking water supply to meet the demands upto the year 2010; ii) To rehabilitate and expand the Dandora Sewage Works and provide for the treatment of increased flow of waste water. iii) To provide support facilities to strengthen the Water and Sewerage Department of NCC.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation - policy, planning and administration
